reviewText: This was something that I had despaired of ever seeing.  The YOU-ARE-THERE version of "The Gunfight AT The O K Corral", with future "Star Trek" co-star Deforest Kelley playing a rather sedate Ike Clanton.  Also featured is the Dalton Gang's final crime, the failed robbery of two banks in their home town of Coffeeville; a crime which prompted their downfall.
great series.  I bought this especially because Barry Atwater is in it.

I enjoyed this show as a kid.  TV westerns were really popular back then but this show presents pretty accurate historical re-enactments of exciting events in an on-the-spot news format.  Interesting and fun novelty, and both shows only about 25 minutes.
